description:
Protect your bike from the bumps and dings of everyday life. This protective film is designed for bikes, not cars or helicopters. “Self-healing” vinyl compound keeps paint looking fresh, because cool as scars are, they don’t add resale value.

  • Covered kits offer ~30% coverage and protect the most high risk areas: top of the toptube, bottom of the bottom tube, chainstays, and seat stays
  • Available in matte or gloss finish
  • Self-healing film smooths out with the warmth of a sunny day
  • Low-friction surface sheds dirt easily
  • RideWrap guarantees their products for 10 years against discolouration and cracking
  • Easy to apply at home – some trimming may be required
  • Includes application solution, cloth, applicator squeegee, and instructions
name: RideWrap Essential Protection - Frame Kit
